QuestData.Title: The Rebel Lord's Arsenal
QuestData.Description: The arsenal Crowley speaks of is in the cellar of a building just west of here.$B$BIt is unnerving that artillery was smuggled inside the city by my enemies, yet it might end up saving Gilnean lives today.$B$BFind Josiah Avery and requisition the rebel artillery. We will put the weapons to good use.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Josiah Avery at the Military District in Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: Don't look at me! Leave me alone!
